permanentlyMissableNotes.text: When starting a new game, you must choose the keepsake Lands Between Rune, as it is the only way to get this item.
You must obtain all items from Leyndell, Royal Capital before defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.
It is recommended to complete all quests before killing the Fire Giant.
Casual Greeting gesture becomes unobtainable after invading Great Horned Tragoth during Volcano Manor's quest.
Reverential Bow gesture becomes unobtainable if you attack and kill Alberich before he performs the gesture.
Mausoleum Knights, Mausoleum Soldiers and Mausoleum Foot Soldiers (and all their unique drops) become unobtainable after taking down all Wandering Mausoleums.

Hammer Talisman and Recusant Henricus become unavailable after joining Volcano Manor, or after clearing all the area bosses in Limgrave (Tree Sentinel, Flying Dragon Agheel, Tibia Mariner in Summonwater Village, Mad Pumpkin Head in Waypoint Ruins, and Margit the Fell Omen).

notes: You must complete Bloody Finger Hunter Yura's quest before he becomes possessed by Shabiri.

quests.name: Nepheli Loux
notes: You must complete Nepheli Loux's quest before killing Morgott and Maliketh.

quests.name: Patches
notes: You must get all Patches' items then kill him to get Leather Set.

quests.name: Sorcerer Rogier
notes: You must complete Rogier's quest before talking with Ranni at the Three Sisters.

quests.name: White Mask Varre
notes: Bravo! gesture must be obtained before meeting Varre in Rose Church, ideally right after defeating your first demigod.

quests.name: Diallos
notes: You must complete Diallos' quest before finishing Volcano Manor quest.

quests.name: Blackguard Big Boggart
notes: You must speak with Rya in Liurnia of the Lakes before entering the Volcano Manor.
You must kill Blackguard Big Boggart to obtain Iron Ball.

quests.name: Dung Eater
notes: You must complete Blackguard Big Boggart's quest before fighting Dung Eater in the Outer Moat.
uniqueItems: Mending Rune of the Fell Curse

quests.name: Hyetta
notes: You must complete Edgar's quest before talking with Hyetta.

quests.name: Ranni

Nokstella, Eternal City Site of Grace
Nokstella Waterfall Basin Site of Grace
Cathedral of Manus Celes Site of Grace
Divine Tower of Liurnia Site of Grace

quests.name: Rya
notes: You must speak with Rya in Liurnia of the Lakes before entering the Volcano Manor.
You must complete Rya's quest to the point where Zorayas move in Legacy Dungeon's interior, before completing the Volcano Manor quest and before killing Rykard.
You must choose to leave Rya alive, then return after killing Rykard, to obtain both Zorayas' Letter and Daedicar's Woe. Do not kill her and do not give her the tonic.

conflicts.note: Kill Bernahl before finishing Volcano Manor.
Don't kill Bernahl early, and kill Recusant Bernahl

quests.name: Preceptor Seluvis
notes: To complete Preceptor Seluvis' and Ranni's quest in the same playthrough, you must betray Ranni, then make her forgive you by seeking absolution at the Church of Vows.

conflicts.note: Give the potion to Dung Eater.
Be summoned to help Millicent defeat NPC invaders.

quests.name: Volcano Manor
notes: You must complete Volcano Manor's quest before killing Rykard.
